dialogs.responseText: Hi, welcome to my shop. I'm really into swords, if you couldn't tell. If you ever find any interesting swords on your adventures, I'd be happy to take a look at them. Maybe we can strike a deal.

Oh wow! Where did you find this? This looks like a weapon of the giants. They used to inhabit Tackure a very long time ago. There aren't any around anymore, but I've found a number of similar blades buried here on the island.

dialogs.buttonText: Where can I learn more about this sword?
dialogs.responseText: Kumuhana knows a lot about the history of the island, you could probably ask him for help. He's just in the house across from this one.
